title: Store numbers of leading supermarkets in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2018
summary: The Store numbers Supermarket in the supermarkets United was Supermarket Aldi , who made 2653 stores .
The most numbers Supermarket was Asda , with just 353 stores .

In second place was Supermarket Sainsbury's with 1412 stores ; third place went to Supermarket Tesco with 2653 stores ; fourth place went to Supermarket Waitrose with 353 stores and fifth place went to Supermarket Lidl , who was 700 stores .
gold: This statistic shows the number of stores for seven of the leading supermarkets in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of February 2018 . Tesco had by far the highest number of stores in the United Kingdom , with a total of 2,653 . This was almost double the amount of Sainbury 's who had the second highest number of stores open .
